snippet: A man stabbed two children in a Brooklyn housing development on Sunday evening, killing a 6-year-old boy and leaving a 7-year-old girl in critical condition, the police said.
abstract: Mikayla Capers, age 7, and Prince Joshua Avitto, age 6, are stabbed by a man on the elevator of their Brooklyn housing project; Avitto is pronounced dead at the hospital and Capers is in critical condition; police recover knife at scene but no arrest has been made.

byline.contributor: J. David Goodman, John Surico and Vivian Yee contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A man stabbed two children in a Brooklyn housing development on Sunday evening, killing a 6-year-old boy and leaving a 7-year-old girl in critical condition, the police said.

headline.main: Boy, 6, Dies After a Stabbing in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Boy, 6, Dies After a Stabbing in Brooklyn
